examples: I live in a house on the corner of Main Street.
She decorated her house with a lot of plants.
Eu vivo em uma casa na esquina da rua principal.
Ela decorou sua casa com muitas plantas.

suggested: Why did the house go to the doctor? Because it had a window pane.
The house that was once filled with laughter, now stood empty and silent.
The house was always a mess, no matter how much cleaning was done.
The house was much bigger on the inside than it appeared on the outside.
The smell of fresh baked cookies coming from the house.
The feeling of the rough texture of the bricks on the exterior of the house.
The connection to family and memories associated with a childhood home.
